page.title: 09School Meals
page.content: Our school dinners are different.We have a cafeteria.This means that you can choose what you eat.We come in at nine o'clock and order our dinner from the menu.At dinner time we get our trays,knives and forks and go to the hatch.We get our dinner then choose our pudding and our drinks.Everyday there are lots of cakes to choose from.We pay at the till.Most of the children have free dinners.They get a disc which is 70p for their dinner.We did a survey to find out favourite dinners.Hot Dogs was first,then Fish Fingers,third was Beefburgers.The best pudding was Chocolate Eclairs,second was Choc-ices and third was jelly.The favourite drink was Vimto,second was milk shake.Our cook has three helpers in the kitchen.Five dinner ladies look after us at dinner time. Some children have packed lunches.
